name: RTCRtpSynchronizationSource.voiceActivityFlag
description: The read-only voiceActivityFlag property of the RTCRtpSynchronizationSource interface indicates whether or not the most recent RTP packet on the source includes voice activity.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'voiceActivityFlag' in the 'WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers' specification.
